caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. DAVID WAYNE

opinion.opinion_text:
COA: 228995, Allegan CC: 95-009676-FC.
On order of the Court, the delayed application for leave to appeal from the April 20, 2001 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).
